---
description: Production-ready React component templates for authentication, data display, and user management.
---

# Components

Copy-paste React components organized by category.

import { Cards, Card } from 'nextra/components'

## Categories

<Cards>
  <Card title="Authentication" href="/docs/templates/components/auth" />
  <Card title="Data Display" href="/docs/templates/components/data" />
  <Card title="User Management" href="/docs/templates/components/user" />
</Cards>

## Tech Stack

All components use:

| Technology | Purpose |
|------------|---------|
| TypeScript | Type safety |
| Tailwind CSS | Styling |
| shadcn/ui | UI primitives |
| React Hook Form | Form handling |
| Zod | Validation |
| TanStack Query | Server state |

## What's Included

Each component template provides:
- Complete, production-ready code
- Proper TypeScript types
- Accessible markup (ARIA, keyboard navigation)
- Error and loading states
- Mobile-responsive design
